title: R.V. Juniors
text: The Roseau Valley Juniors or more commonly, R.V. Juniors, are a <a href="Saint%20Lucia">Lucian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in the <a href="Anse%20la%20Raye%20Quarter">Anse la Raye Quarter</a>. The club currently plays in the <a href="SLFA%20First%20Division">SLFA First Division</a>, the top tier of <a href="Football%20in%20Saint%20Lucia">Saint Lucian football</a>.
